function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Reduction in public transport ridership","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Mass unemployment and increase in home working","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decrease in air and noise pollution","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Spread of novel human coronavirus due to hypermobility and interconnectedness of transport networks.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate existing transport policy approaches to respond to the new challenges posed by covid-19.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of recognition of the important role of individual choice and actions in delivering socially desired transport outcomes in a post-covid world.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Asymptomatic travelers exporting infection undetected across international borders","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 to most countries on earth","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relaxation of restrictions and social distancing measures without proper precautions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Individuals not following public health guidelines","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Panic buying and hoarding in supermarkets","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Dependency on online shopping and home deliveries","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased movement of people and goods may lead to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Encouraging people to return to work and use private vehicles may increase the risk of contagious disease transmission in public spaces.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased use of public transport and active travel may lead to overcrowding in public spaces, increasing the risk of contagious disease transmission.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited accessibility to active travel options such as walking and cycling","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Decreased confidence in the safety of public transport","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Uncertainty about the efficacy and public acceptance of safety interventions in public transport","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Significant impact on air passenger transport due to global transmission of the virus and travel restrictions","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Uncertainty about the return of passenger air demand to pre-pandemic levels","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Financial support for the aviation industry granted without strict environmental conditions","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of awareness of the effects of mobility and travel behavior on disease transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective implementation of responsible transport concept","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Resistance to change in global transport policies and planning","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapidly changing policy and service environment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"New technological and service innovations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of suitable modes for responsible transport","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Traveling for work-related activities increases the risk of contagious disease transmission.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Imported items and perishable foodstuffs are likely to be transported by air, increasing the risk of spreading contagious diseases.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for local cultural and religious practices during travel increases the risk of cultural transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reduction in the provision of quality public and active transport alternatives due to veneration of private car","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Struggles in promoting public transport due to social distancing measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of overcrowding in public transport","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Encouraging individual responsibility for personal actions can create a false sense of security and lead to complacency in following public health guidelines.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on individual responsibility may lead to a lack of oversight and regulation in ensuring safety and hygiene standards in public transport and shared mobility.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of social equity and accessibility in responsible transport policies may exacerbate health disparities and increase the risk of contagious diseases in marginalized communities.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through international transport networks","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of local mobility needs and conditions in transport policy","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of cooperation and coordination in international policy making","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for increased transmission of contagious diseases due to interconnectedness and interdependencies of everyday life.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of political trust, transparency, and action leading to ineffective disease containment efforts.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reluctance to embrace individual responsibility for public health and welfare, hindering disease containment efforts.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Polarized and negative news coverage of the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sustained exposure to negative covid-19 news causing stress and desensitisation","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decreasing interest and avoidance of covid-19 news","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of information on vaccination status","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Presence of pre-existing medical conditions","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High levels of anxiety and fear related to covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High fear of covid-19 due to pre-existing conditions","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Avoidance of news about covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"}]}
